response.original_title: Mickey & Minnie's Gift of the Magi
response.overview: A reading by the narrator of the Walt Disney book "Mickey & Minnie's Gift of the Magi". In this book, Mickey and Minnie both desire to give each other the best gift possible, but neither has the funds to do so. So, they trade it their most valued possession for the best Christmas gift. In the end, they both exchange the item that the gift was intended to protect or display. It is the miracle of selfless giving where both participants give and get so much more than a temporal gift.
response.title: Mickey & Minnie's Gift of the Magi
